item.title: Terminal Sharing service
item.description: What’s tmate? On *nix systems, sometimes we need support. And geeks don’t like GUI apps just to have your system in front of them, at least I don’t like that ðŸ˜‰ tmate is terminal sharing software you can use it to connect with your friends and you both work from there. It’s available in many distributions repos and in case you aren’t lucky enough, you can compile it from source or there are pre-compiled binaries there in their Github page.
